actions.name: AssignInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to assign a registered instance to a layer

actions.name: AssignVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to assign one of the stack's registered Amazon EBS volumes to a specified instance

actions.name: AssociateElasticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to associate one of the stack's registered Elastic IP addresses with a specified instance

actions.name: AttachElasticLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to attach an Elastic Load Balancing load balancer to a specified layer

actions.name: CloneStack
actions.description: Grants permission to create a clone of a specified stack

actions.name: CreateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to create an app for a specified stack

actions.name: CreateDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to run deployment or stack commands

actions.name: CreateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create an instance in a specified stack

actions.name: CreateLayer
actions.description: Grants permission to create a layer

actions.name: CreateStack
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new stack

actions.name: CreateUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new user profile

actions.name: DeleteApp
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified app

actions.name: DeleteInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified instance, which terminates the associated Amazon EC2 instance

actions.name: DeleteLayer
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified layer

actions.name: DeleteStack
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified stack

actions.name: DeleteUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user profile

actions.name: DeregisterEcsCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user profile

actions.name: DeregisterElasticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified Elastic IP address

actions.name: DeregisterInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a registered Amazon EC2 or on-premises instance

actions.name: DeregisterRdsDbInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an Amazon RDS instance

actions.name: DeregisterVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an Amazon EBS volume

actions.name: DescribeAgentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the available AWS OpsWorks agent versions

actions.name: DescribeApps
actions.description: Grants permission to request a description of a specified set of apps

actions.name: DescribeCommands
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the results of specified commands

actions.name: DescribeDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to request a description of a specified set of deployments

actions.name: DescribeEcsClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon ECS clusters that are registered with a stack

actions.name: DescribeElasticIps
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Elastic IP addresses

actions.name: DescribeElasticLoadBalancers
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a stack's Elastic Load Balancing instances

actions.name: DescribeInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to request a description of a set of instances

actions.name: DescribeLayers
actions.description: Grants permission to request a description of one or more layers in a specified stack

actions.name: DescribeLoadBasedAutoScaling
actions.description: Grants permission to describe load-based auto scaling configurations for specified layers

actions.name: DescribeMyUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a user's SSH information

actions.name: DescribeOperatingSystems
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the operating systems that are supported by AWS OpsWorks Stacks

actions.name: DescribePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the permissions for a specified stack

actions.name: DescribeRaidArrays
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an instance's RAID arrays

actions.name: DescribeRdsDbInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon RDS instances

actions.name: DescribeServiceErrors
actions.description: Grants permission to describe AWS OpsWorks service errors

actions.name: DescribeStackProvisioningParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to request a description of a stack's provisioning parameters

actions.name: DescribeStackSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the number of layers and apps in a specified stack, and the number of instances in each state, such as running_setup or online

actions.name: DescribeStacks
actions.description: Grants permission to request a description of one or more stacks

actions.name: DescribeTimeBasedAutoScaling
actions.description: Grants permission to describe time-based auto scaling configurations for specified instances

actions.name: DescribeUserProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to describe specified users

actions.name: DescribeVolumes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an instance's Amazon EBS volumes

actions.name: DetachElasticLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to detache a specified Elastic Load Balancing instance from its layer

actions.name: DisassociateElasticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Elastic IP address from its instance

actions.name: GetHostnameSuggestion
actions.description: Grants permission to get a generated host name for the specified layer, based on the current host name theme

actions.name: GrantAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to grant RDP access to a Windows instance for a specified time period

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags that are applied to the specified stack or layer

actions.name: RebootInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot a specified instance

actions.name: RegisterEcsCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to register a specified Amazon ECS cluster with a stack

actions.name: RegisterElasticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to register an Elastic IP address with a specified stack

actions.name: RegisterInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to register instances with a specified stack that were created outside of AWS OpsWorks

actions.name: RegisterRdsDbInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to register an Amazon RDS instance with a stack

actions.name: RegisterVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to register an Amazon EBS volume with a specified stack

actions.name: SetLoadBasedAutoScaling
actions.description: Grants permission to specify the load-based auto scaling configuration for a specified layer

actions.name: SetPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to specify a user's permissions

actions.name: SetTimeBasedAutoScaling
actions.description: Grants permission to specify the time-based auto scaling configuration for a specified instance

actions.name: StartInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to start a specified instance

actions.name: StartStack
actions.description: Grants permission to start a stack's instances

actions.name: StopInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a specified instance

actions.name: StopStack
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a specified stack

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to apply tags to a specified stack or layer

actions.name: UnassignInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to unassign a registered instance from all of it's layers

actions.name: UnassignVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to unassign an assigned Amazon EBS volume

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a specified stack or layer

actions.name: UpdateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified app

actions.name: UpdateElasticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to update a registered Elastic IP address's name

actions.name: UpdateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified instance

actions.name: UpdateLayer
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified layer

actions.name: UpdateMyUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a user's SSH public key

actions.name: UpdateRdsDbInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon RDS instance

actions.name: UpdateStack
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified stack

actions.name: UpdateUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specified user profile

actions.name: UpdateVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon EBS volume's name or mount point
